body: Address: VIB Esports Oman, Al Alal Building, Al Alalal St, Alal Al Alal, Muscat, Oman

header: What are the prices for gaming cafe?
body:
We have flexible plans to suit your gaming needs.

Premium lounge (RTX2070 PCs): OMR 5 / hour.
Regular lounge: OMR 3 / hour.

Membership starts from OMR 19.99 a month.

header: What are the timings during lockdown?
body:
In compliance with local policies. Following are our schedules:

Saturday - Friday
5AM - 8PM

You may reach out to us via the following numbers:

+968 123123123
+968 234234234

VIB cafes have an extensive library of games, apps, Internet browsers, and much more.

Drop by and explore as much as you want, any time you want.
